Service Details: - Enhances patient care and comfort at the Kelowna General Hospital by raising revenue through the operations of the Royal Bistro (hospital deli), Perking Lot (coffee bar), Centennial Mercantile (hospital gift shop), Rutland Thrift Store, Cottonwoods Gift Shop- Funds raised are crucial and help purchase state of the art medical equipment that assist with the enhancement of the care and comforts of the patients of KGH- Volunteer opportunities available
Hours: Business Enterprises Manager:  - Mon-Fri: 8:00am - 4:00pm (on call all days and hours)- Mon-Fri: 7:00am - 8:00pm (all venues open)- Sat-Sun: 8:00am - 8:00pm (Royal Bistro and Centennial Mercantile)- Sat-Sun: 8:00am - 5:00pm (Perking Lot)
How to Apply: Contact the Business Manager by email or by phone to inquire about volunteer opportunities
Cost: Membership:- KGH Auxiliary Membership, $20.00 per year- Rutland Auxiliary Membership, $7.00 per year- Volunteers, Free
Meetings: - Auxiliary members attend one meeting per month except Jul and Aug- Jun and Dec are designated as dinner meetings (member picks up half the cost)- Volunteers attend organizational meetings and training meetings as needed, approximately 3 times a year
